title: Aquilah Homestay
content: The 100% non-smoking Quality Inn & Suites Garden of the Gods hotel is located off of Interstate 25. Free Wi-Fi and an outdoor heated pool are provided.
location: Calle Nueva Street, Brgy. Poblacion 5, Palawan, Coron Town Proper, 5316 Coron, Philippines

title: Kalis Viewpoint Lodge Coron
content: Kayangan Lake is 5.5 km from the accommodation, while Twin Lagoon is 5.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco B. Reyes, 33.8 km from Kalis Viewpoint Lodge Coron, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
location: San Augustin Street Barangay Poblacion 4, Coron Town Proper, 5316 Coron, Philippines

title: Bacau Bay Resort Coron
content: The rooms in the resort are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a seating area. All units are fitted with a balcony that offers different views. Other in-room amenities include an electric kettle, a wardrobe, and a safety deposit box. The bathrooms come with a bidet and shower along with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Slippers and bathrobes are also provided for your convenience.
location: Governor's Drive, Sitio Jolo, Poblacion 5, Palawan, 5316 Coron, Philippines

title: Bacau Bay Resort Coron
content: The rooms in the resort are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a seating area. All units are fitted with a balcony that offers different views. Other in-room amenities include an electric kettle, a wardrobe, and a safety deposit box. The bathrooms come with a bidet and shower along with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Slippers and bathrobes are also provided for your convenience.
location: Governor's Drive, Sitio Jolo, Poblacion 5, Palawan, 5316 Coron, Philippines

title: Casa Coron Hotel
content: Located conveniently in the Coron Town Proper district of Coron, Casa Coron Hotel is located a 19-minute walk from Dicanituan Beach, 5.5 km from Kayangan Lake and 5.6 km from Twin Lagoon. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel has family rooms.
location: Real Street, Barangay Poblacion Coron Town, Palawan, Coron Town Proper, 5316 Coron, Philippines

title: The Funny Lion
content: The Funny Lion features of an outdoor swimming pool, an open air bath featuring natural views, and dining options on-site, this 4-star resort is 0.9 mi from Mount Tapyas and 4 mi from Kayangan Lake in Coron. WiFi is available for free throughout the property.
location: Sitio Jolo, Poblacion V, Palawan, Coron Town Proper, 5316 Coron,

title: Acacia Garden Inn
content: Acacia Garden Inn offers rooms that are air-conditioned and come with a flat-screen cable TV, as well as a private bathroom with a bidet. Selected rooms offer mountain views and a sofa bed. Slippers and free toiletries are also included.
location: Barangay 1, Felisidad Street, Palawan, Coron Town Proper, 5316 Coron, Philippines

title: Island Brasserie Hostel
content: Located in Coron, 2.4 km from Dicanituan Beach, and Kayangan Lake reachable within 5 km, Island Brasserie Hostel offers a restaurant, a bar and free WiFi. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.
location: National Highway, Brgy Poblacion 1, Coron, Palawan, Coron Town Proper, 5316 Coron, Philippines

title: Jai-cob’s Suites
content: Located in Coron, one kilometer from Dicanituan Beach, Jai-cob’s Suites has accommodations with a restaurant, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Located around 5.3 km from Kayangan Lake, the hotel with free WiFi is also 5.5 km away from Twin Lagoon. The hotel has family rooms.
location: Real Street 12, Coron Town Proper, 5316 Coron, Philippines

title: Coron Soleil Garden Resort
content: All rooms at Coron Soleil Garden Resort feature views of the swimming pool, a flat-screen TV with cable channel, and a mini-bar. Other in-room amenities include a desk, a safety deposit box, and a wardrobe. Some rooms come with a seating area and a kitchenette with a dining table and a microwave. The private bathroom has a shower facility, a bidet, and free toiletries. A hairdryer is also provided for your convenience.
